review: Love my device. Now for everyone else to fix their issues so that I can enjoy streaming.On certain sites I loose streaming.

review: I love it! I use it almost everyday.
author: judith love

review: Fantastic product.  Love this!  Streaming Netflix on my tv using it.  Could not be happier!!!!However I caution against buying a sepetate cable to power the Chromecast in the USB port on your TV.  Mine didn't work, apparently my tv's USB doesn't produce enough power for the Chromecast to work.  However it worked just as beautifully as promised once I used the power cord that came in the box with the Chromecast and plugged it into the wall.
author: Adrian
